item.description:
Join Laura Messina as she shares the easiert way to clean your life up!

 

The program choices run between 7-21 days and includes: a complete Instruction Guide that is full of recipes for soups, roasted veggies, high quality grains and even some clean proteins – all of which are intertwined within the program. The ultimate goal of this Detox is to help individuals understand how to make the best food choices for a lifetime. Please come to one of our Complimentary Informational nights to understand why detoxifying the body is so important and how to begin. We have made it fun, affordable and life changing! 

 

This program is open to the public and free to sit in on!  Come learn!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Detoxification Program- Where to start?? Here!
